attributes.action: Call for Parliament to motion a vote of No Confidence in the current government
attributes.additional_details: The issues we face as a country today far outweigh those of any party political tribalism we need to be seen by the rest of the world as a pivot of democracy honouring the views of its citizens whilst assuring those investing in UK we have a sustainable and robust plan for the short & long term future. This motion that the "continuance of the ministers in office" is an obstacle to an "efficient, united and extended administration" of the country is the only option left to the British people
attributes.background: The government held referendum regarding membership of the EU, the public assumed they would be effective with a leave or remain plan of action preceding the vote it appears no plan was ever in place effectively leaving the UK economically vulnerable and the British public divided.
